scrape.author: Viola
scrape.text: I kept reading because I was wondering when this book would hold up to the reviews. Absolutely worst translation of a book into English Iâ€™ve ever read. Switching between English and American for school related matters. Calling it elementary school, later using A as marks them swooping to the continental numbers. Using football and soccer when as the same term. The whole book just not saying anything, not giving anything a name... not to speak of a parent promoting their child to kill a cousin and cover it up.
